skills.noPackage: Sorry, no package found for this technology. Try another tab!

p.1: Essential concepts have been mastered both on the front-end and back-end. It's now practice and tackling algorithmic challenges that will push you to excel. 'Practice makes perfect.' Whether it's taking on small projects or continuing your learning with larger ones, alongside your job search, there's no doubt that you will continue to progress!
p.2: Furthermore, as someone who was the group leader during the final phase of the program, I had complete confidence in your ability to lead, motivate, and unify the group. Your technical skills and your kindness were your greatest assets throughout the program, especially towards the end.
p.3: From the beginning, your active participation was consistent and immensely helpful to your fellow classmates. You were clearly at the forefront when it came to helping others who were less advanced.
p.4: In addition, you consistently contributed with insightful questions and remarks. All of this was always done with a great deal of humility and kindness.
p.5: In short, thank you for being a driving force in this regard.

aleks.conclusion: It's thanks to your massive effort, as well as your humility and kindness towards those around you, that you will be able to go even further and with great success. Thank you for what you have brought to this cohort. Best of luck!
aleks.credentials: , Fullstack Web Developer and Trainer, End-of-Training Assessment

alysson.1: Khadim has handled his responsibilities and tasks with professionalism and care, quickly adapting to his role.
alysson.2: He continuously updates his knowledge, making him efficient within a company and during project execution.
alysson.3: Listening, diligent, and engaged, Khadim is a pleasure to work with, and I highly recommend him.
